s4717: Year 43: Chu led us to attack Zheng.
s4735: Year 18: Attacked Chen and entered Chen.
s4745: Year 13: Led Chen and Cai to attack Zheng.
s4748: Year 22: Chu led us to attack Zheng.
s4751: Year 19: Chu led Chen and Cai to attack us.
s4789: Year 29: Wu Ji Zha came to observe Zhou music and fully understood what the music meant.
s4790: Year 4: Wu Ji Zha came as envoy and was happy with Yan Ying.
s4801: Year 4: Gate guard killed Yu Ji. Ji Zha made feudal lords.
s4813: Year 49: Took Chu woman for crown prince; duke seduced her; crown prince killed duke and self-established.
s4815: Year 23: Various dukes contended for favor and mutually killed; also wanted to kill Zi Chan; Zi Cheng stopped them.
s4825: Year 3: Wang Ji Fu became Ling Yin.
s4839: Year 17: Qin Hou Zi came fleeing.
s4840: Year 36: Duke's younger brother Hou Zi fled to Jin; thousand chariots.
s4853: Year 2: Duke went to Jin; reached river; Jin apologized and returned him.
s4855: Year 18: Qi Tian Wu Yu came to send woman.
s4880: Year 6: Duke wanted to kill nobles and establish favorite minister; nobles punished favorite minister; duke feared and fled to Qi.
s4885: Year 4: Claimed illness and did not assemble with Chu.
s4889: Year 3: Summer assembled feudal lords at Song land and allied. Attacked Wu Zhu Fang; punished Qing Feng. Winter reported us; took three cities.
s4891: Year 6: Claimed illness and did not assemble with Chu.
s4894: Year 17: Claimed illness and did not assemble with Chu.
s4895: Year 28: Zi Chan said: 'Three states will not assemble.'
s4904: Year 40: Duke died. Hou Zi returned from Jin.
s4905: Year 4: Led feudal lords to attack Wu.
s4913: Year 11: Chu led feudal lords to attack us.
s4918: Year 12: Duke went to Jin; requested to attack Yan and enter their ruler.
s4919: Year 22: Qi Jing Gong came; requested to attack Yan and enter their ruler.
s4921: Year 5: Attacked Wu; next at Gan Xi.
s4937: Year 6: Seized Yu Yin fugitive and entered Zhang Hua.
s4939: Year 9: Lady Jiang had no son.
s4949: Year 8: Duke went to Chu; Chu detained him. Celebrated Zhang Hua Terrace.
s4953: Year 7: Went to Zhang Hua Terrace; inner fugitives filled it. Extinguished Chen.
s4956: Year 35: Younger brother Zhao made chaos; Ai Gong self-killed.
s4969: Year 8: Younger brother Qi Ji led troops to pacify Chen.
s4972: Chen Hui Gong Wu, first year. Ai Gong's grandson. Chu came to pacify us.
s4983: Year 26: Spring had star out Yu Nu. Seventh month duke died.
s5001: Year 10: Drunk killed Cai Hou; made Qi Ji surround them. Qi Ji resided there; was Cai Hou.
s5005: Year 12: Ling Hou went to Chu; Chu killed him; made Qi Ji reside there; was Cai Hou.
s5013: Year 12: Courted Jin to river; Jin apologized and returned him.
s5017: Year 11: King attacked Xu to frighten Wu; next at Gan Xi. People tired at service; resented king.
s5019: Year 5: Duke went to Jin; courted successor ruler.
s5033: Year 12: Qi Ji made chaos and self-established; Ling Wang self-killed. Restored Chen and Cai.
s5036: Year 5: Chu Ping Wang restored Chen; established Hui Gong.
s5037: Year 2: Chu Ping Wang restored us; established Jing Hou Zi Lu.
s5061: Year 15: Solar eclipse. Duke went to Jin; Jin detained him for burial; duke was ashamed.
s5065: Year 2: King took Qin woman for crown prince; good; self took her.
s5079: Year 6: Duke died. Six ministers strong; ducal house low.
s5103: Year 5: Fire; wanted to exorcise it; Zi Chan said: 'Better cultivate virtue.'
s5141: Year 20: Qi Jing Gong hunted with Yan Zi; entered Lu to ask ritual.
s5142: Year 26: Hunted Lu border; because entered Lu.
s5145: Year 7: Punished Wu She and Shang; crown prince Jian fled to Song; Wu Xu fled to Wu.
s5146: Year 10: Duke had no trust. Deceived and killed various dukes. Chu crown prince Jian came fleeing; saw chaos; went to Zheng.
s5149: Year 9: Ping Hou died. Ling Hou's grandson Dong Guo killed Ping Hou's son and self-established.
s5151: Year 8: Chu crown prince Jian came fleeing from Song.
s5157: Year 21: Duke went to Jin to river; Jin apologized and returned him. Solar eclipse.
s5193: Year 10: Wu attacked and defeated us.
s5196: Year 15: Wu defeated our troops; took Hu and Shen.
s5199: Year 11: Chu Jian made chaos; killed him.
s5201: Year 8: Gong Zi Guang defeated Chu.
s5209: Year 11: Wu humbled Liang people contending for mulberry; invaded and took our Zhong Li.
s5215: Year 12: Duke went to Jin; requested to bring in king.
s5221: Year 25: Duke wanted to punish Ji clan; three Huan attacked duke; duke went to reside in Yun.
s5237: Year 26: Qi took our Yun to place duke.
s5241: Year 13: Wanted to establish Zi Xi; Zi Xi did not want. Qin woman established; was Zhao Wang.
s5265: Year 12: Gong Zi Guang had Zhuan Zhu kill Liao; self-established.
s5269: Year 28: Duke went to Jin; sought entry; Jin did not listen; placed at Gan Hou.
s5285: Year 29: Duke from Gan Hou went to Yun. Qi duke said: 'Main ruler.' Duke was ashamed; returned to Gan Hou.
s5305: Year 4: Wu three dukes came fleeing; enfeoffed to resist Wu.
s5313: Year 3: Three dukes fled to Chu.
s5321: Year 5: Wu attacked our Liu and Qian.
s5329: Year 4: Attacked Chu Liu and Qian.
s5332: Year 10: Jin made feudal lords build city for us.
s5333: Year 32: Duke died at Gan Hou.
s5335: Year 2: Led feudal lords to build city for Zhou.
s5342: Year 5: Ping Gong's younger brother Tong killed Xiang Gong and self-established.
s5353: Year 7: Nang Wa defeated Wu; obtained Chu Hou.
s5357: Year 10: Courted Chu; detained because of cloak.
s5361: Year 6: Chu attacked us; welcomed and struck; defeated them; took Chu's Ju Rong.
s5385: Year 9: Cai Zhao Hou detained three years; obtained cloak; so returned.
s5396: Year 14: Together with Jin led feudal lords to invade Chu.
s5399: Year 6: Zhou together with us led feudal lords to invade Chu.
s5400: Year 31: Chu Bao Xi requested rescue.
s5401: Year 10: Wu and Cai attacked us; entered Ying; Zhao Wang fled. Wu Zi Xu whipped Ping Wang's grave.
s5403: Year 29: Contended for supremacy with Cai.
s5405: Year 13: Contended for supremacy with Wei. Chu invaded us; Wu together with us attacked Chu; entered Ying.
s5413: Year 5: Yang Hu seized Ji Kang Zi; allied with him; released him. Solar eclipse.
s5417: Year 11: Qin rescue arrived; Wu left; Zhao Wang re-entered.
s5433: Year 12: Wu attacked our Fan; Chu feared; moved to Qu.
s5444: Year 17: Liu Zi welcomed king; Jin entered king.
s5461: Year 8: Yang Hu wanted to attack three Huan; three Huan attacked Yang Hu; Hu fled Yang Guan.
s5462: Year 46: Lu attacked us. We attacked Lu.
s5465: Year 14: Zi Xi wept for people; people also wept; Cai Zhao Hou feared.
s5467: Year 33: Jin and Lu invaded and attacked us.
s5468: Year 4: Duke went to Wu; Wu detained him; because died in Wu.
s5473: Year 13: Chen Huai Gong came; detained him; died in Wu.
s5478: Year 47: Imprisoned Yang Hu; Hu fled to Jin.
s5493: Year 10: Duke assembled Qi duke at Jia Gu. Confucius was chancellor. Qi returned our land.
s5503: Zheng Sheng Gong Sheng, first year. Zheng became even weaker.
s5512: Year 2: Gave birth to Zhao Gong, Huai Gong, Jian Gong.
s5518: Year 3: State people had dream various gentlemen stood at She Palace; plotted to perish Cao; Zhen Duo requested to wait for Gong Sun Qiang; allowed.
s5525: Year 12: Qi returned female musicians; Ji Kang Zi received them; Confucius departed.
s5526: Year 50: Sent female musicians to Lu.
s5543: Year 15: Zhao Yang attacked Fan and Zhong Xing.
s5547: Year 38: Confucius came; gave salary as in Lu.
s5563: Year 39: Crown prince Wei Kuai fled.
s5566: Year 6: Gong Sun Qiang liked shooting; offered geese; duke made him Si Cheng; dreamers son Xing.
s5569: Year 19: Attacked Yue; defeated us; injured He Lu's finger; died with it.
s5577: Year 21: Extinguished Hu. Because Wu defeated us; we broke them.
s5591: Year 18: Zhao Yang surrounded Fan and Zhong Xing at Chao Ge. Qi and Wei attacked us.
s5593: Year 22: Led feudal lords to surround Cai.
s5597: Year 25: Chu attacked us; because of Wu resentment.
s5606: Year 55: Transported Fan and Zhong Xing millet.
s5607: Year 19: Zhao Yang surrounded Fan and Zhong Xing; Zheng came to save; we defeated them.
s5613: Year 26: Feared Chu; privately summoned Wu people; begged to migrate to Zhou Lai; Zhou Lai near Wu.
s5626: Year 25: Confucius passed Song; Huan Dai hated him.
s5638: Year 57: Begged to save Fan clan.
s5639: Year 21: Zhao Yang seized Han Dan and Bai Ren; had them.
s5645: Year 28: Ministers together punished Zhao Hou.
s5654: Year 58: Jing Gong died. Established favorite concubine's son as crown prince.
s5655: Year 22: Zhao Yang defeated Fan Zhong Xing; Zhong Xing fled to Qi. Attacked Wei.
s5673: Year 23: Saved Chen; king died at Cheng Fu.
s5676: Year 13: Wu attacked us; Chu came to save.
s5685: Year 7: Duke assembled Wu king at Zang. Wu demanded hundred tripods; Ji Kang Zi sent Zi Gong to apologize.
s5694: Year 14: Song surrounded us; Zheng saved us.
s5697: Year 8: Lu assembled us at Zang.
s5701: Year 8: Wu for Zhu attacked us; reached below city; allied and departed. Qi took our three cities.
s5702: Year 2: Attacked Lu; took three cities.
s5706: Year 30: Cao broke us; we extinguished them.
s5710: Year 15: Song extinguished Cao; captured Bo Yang.
s5721: Year 3: Attacked Chen; Chen with Wu reason.
s5722: Year 31: Zheng surrounded us; defeated them at Yong Qiu.
s5724: Year 16: Broke Chu; allied with Wu.
s5727: Year 15: Surrounded Song; defeated our army at Yong Qiu; attacked us.
s5733: Year 10: Together with Wu attacked Qi.
s5734: Year 4: Wu and Lu attacked us. Bao Zi killed Dao Gong; Qi people established his son Ren as Jian Gong.
s5735: Year 27: Sent Zhao Yang to attack Qi.
s5745: Year 11: Together with Lu attacked Qi to save Chen. Punished Wu Quan.
s5750: Qi Jian Gong, first year. Lu together with Wu defeated us.
s5761: Year 12: Together with Lu defeated Qi.
s5765: Year 12: Together with Wu assembled at Tao Gao. Used Tian tax.
s5771: Year 10: Duke went to Jin; together with Wu assembled at Tao Gao.
s5777: Year 13: Together with Lu assembled at Tao Gao.
s5781: Year 13: Together with Wu assembled at Huang Pool.
s5783: Year 30: Together with Wu assembled at Huang Pool; contended for supremacy.
s5793: Year 14: Together with Jin assembled at Huang Pool.
s5797: Year 14: Western hunt obtained unicorn. Wei Chu Gong came fleeing.
s5798: Year 4: Tian Chang killed Jian Gong; established his younger brother Ao as Ping Gong; Chang was chancellor; monopolized state power.
s5803: Year 12: Father Wei Kuai entered; Che fled.
s5813: Year 15: Zi Fu Jing Bo made Qi; Zi Gong was assistant; Qi returned our invaded land.
s5833: Year 10: Bai Gong killed Ling Yin; attacked Hui Wang. Ye Gong attacked Bai Gong; Bai Gong self-killed. Hui Wang recovered state.
s5836: Year 23: Chu extinguished Chen; killed Min Gong.
s5851: Year 3: Zhuang Gong insulted Rong Zhou people; Rong Zhou people together with Zhao Jian Zi attacked Zhuang Gong; fled.
s5864: Year 14: Died; son Li Gong Gong established.
